answers.answer: These symptoms could be due to many illnesses, including Diabetes. has he lost weight and does he go to the bathroom a lot and drinks every chance he gets? (in extreme cases of Ketoacidosis , that won't happen any more)If this is what it is and they have no way of testing and/or treating him, the very best would be for him to eat nothing but oatmean until there is help. This will detoxify the ketones and acidosis and which is most dangerous with Diabetes.Kat

Has your boyfriend been getting alot of vaccinations.  He could be having a reaction to these.  Get the book Prescription for Nutritional Healing and it will give you some ideas as to what you can do to help.
